text.name: Helm of Immortality
text.description:
{Helm of Immortality}

Revives a slain Commander immediately after battle (artifact incremental bonuses are not lost).

{Helm of Immortality}

When worn makes Commander almost invulnerable to physical attack.
text.event: You pick up the shining Helm of Immortality. If your Commander wears this, death will never last for long!
